name: Valkie 64
description: Valkie 64 is an action adventure inspired by action adventure games from the Nintendo 64 era.

name: Monster Mystery
description: A game of survival and Mystery. 3 - 10 Explorers find themselves deep in the mountains of Transilvania. They must stay in the light or die in the dark for within one of them lies a monster.

name: OnlyFap Simulator 4
description: OnlyFap Simulator 4 is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to start making streams.

name: Corrupted Beats
description: Corrupted Beats is a rouguelite top down shooter game. Survive the waves of enemies spawning and reacting to the beat of the music pulsing around you as you create and manage unique builds of various items and weapons that help you tame corrupted music.

name: Peebi
description: Use your wit, sarcasm and a general lack of regard for others in this Point-n-Click adventure. Full of bad humour, bizarre decor and a world of inconveniences, with clues hidden in plain sight, problems with unusual solutions and an alt-culture flair.

name: Futanari Sex: Locker Room Affair
description: An erotic visual novel about two gorgeous cheerleaders after a day of practice. Everything takes a turn when the secretly futanari starts taking pictures of her naked teammate.

name: Labyrinth Hearts II
description: Descend into the Labyrinth to bring peace to the world. First person / 3rd person dungeon crawler with the option to enable romance/adult mode.

name: Karma Guardians
description: Karma Guardians is a unique exploration RPG that takes place in the world of Ethera. The main objective is to restore the life force of nine rune stones. Player stats are similar to old-school D20 RPG games. The game features an MMO-style player controller for movement.

name: Arcanima: Mist of Oblivion
description: Awake your anima in this action RPG combining Hack N Slash combat with JRPG mechanics! Join the anima user 'Juno' in her journey to clear the Mist of Oblivion, shape your anima through your actions and find answers before all meaning is lost. Willpower is your only limit!

name: VR New York Story, Settle in New York
description: VR New York Story's second edition, "Settle in New York" is now finally released! Consisting of 120 episodes including various situations, this is a total package for you to advance your English speaking skills! With Virtual Reality technology, you will feel as if you are in New York!

name: Moto Offroad Simulator
description: Moto Offroad Simulator is a racing game and is what you searched for! At the wheel of a motocross you will have to go through the mud, do stunts in the mountains and all this without putting your life in danger.

name: Borealis Aberration
description: Borealis Aberration is a survival-horror PvEvP tactical Third Person Shooter placed in a post-apocalyptic solar-punk world, where a mysterious organism has contaminated the planet’s atmosphere, making it impossible for humanity to breathe.

name: Space Saviour Special
description: Space Savior Special. Shmup genre game. Help Earth in her last awakened attempt to save humanity from the Naggal Biomechanical Virus. Use everything you have to get through enemy forces! Your ship, your pods, your bombs, your faith and your reflexes to destroy your terrible enemy!

name: Ghost Cam
description: Ghost Cam is a spooky exploratory VR and PC game where you search for ghosts – at your own risk… Discover how good you are at finding ghosts, figuring out clues and uncovering the story - if you can survive the multiple endings.

name: Project Electric Sheep
description: A ground-breaking 3D dream simulator powered by AI. Tell Project Electric Sheep what you wish to dream about and dive into a visual interpretation of your dream, complete with characters, dialogue and places all generated in real-time by OpenAI's GPT-3.

name: The Fall
description: A short visual novel about a man living its worst nightmare. There is no way out, no safe place, no death, just eternal limbo. Only you can help him... if that's what you want.

name: Rowbots
description: You are sent to an hostile Space-Station with the mission to stop an AI-Super-Computer that has gone rogue!

name: WinterThunder
description: A Hex and Counter turn based World War 2 game. Turns are 2 days and hexes cover 6 miles or 10 kilometers. Punch a hole in the Allied line and use Strategic Movement to break through to Belgium.

name: The Karaoke
description: The Karaoke is a Japanese horror game about a girl at a Karaoke.

name: Space Slaves
description: Space Slaves is a tactical space fighting game where an AI apocalypse destroys most of the human race, and the humans that survived are used by the AI as slaves to generate electricity by being placed in pleasure machines. Their emotions and pleasure are harvested by the AI to power their ships.

name: Vividlope
description: Vividlope, the head-spinning, mind-bending arcade game with a puzzle touch! Master the imaginative realm, where the gravity doesn't quite work as you're used to, overcome your foes and keep on painting!

name: Kawaii Elf Girls
description: Kawaii Elf Girls — it's a relaxing anime puzzles with cute kawaii elf girls. Solve puzzles, and collect full images. Enjoy high quality artworks.

name: Rapscallions on Deck
description: Four unhinged pirates kidnap Larsa since they’re in desperate need of a swabbie to mop the deck. And that’s how Larsa finds herself on a pirate ship in the middle of the ocean. Since women are prohibited on board, she doesn't know how she’s going to tell the crew that she’s a girl.

name: Roxy Raccoon 2: Topsy-Turvy
description: Roxy Raccoon 2: Topsy-Turvy is a Tilt Maze/Labyrinth style like no other. Play through the next chapter in the Roxy Raccoon Saga, compete in various game modes and customize & create your own levels, then share them with the world!

name: Naomi's Exhibition
description: During a local holiday, Naomi was called to update the security camera system. Taking advantage of the cameras have been turned off, she decides to put her fetish into action.

name: My Ex-future Family
description: My Ex-Future Family is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the fun parts of human life. The game is packed with humor, sex, romance and plot turnings. Play as a young man who seduces girls who surround him, complete tasks of the Principal and build your life in house of your family!

name: Fairy Girl
description: Every forest needs care. Caring for such an ancient forest is especially important. A fairy takes care of this forest, living in it in peace and harmony.

name: Until Last Tomorrow
description: Until Last Tomorrow is an open world action and adventure game that takes place here in Brazil, in the city of Goiânia, in an extremely dangerous environment, where you will have to survive the pandemic that has taken over the world.

name: Freddy Frog 2
description: Freddy Frog is on a mission to be the highest frog in the world. This frog just wants to keep jumping and you need to guide his hopping legs onto the next available platform. Be careful. These platforms are not what they seem and a fall from a great height is not good for Freddy Frog.

name: OnlyFap: Fitness Baby
description: OnlyFap: Fitness Baby is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to start making streams.

name: Escape From the Red Planet
description: Escape From The Red Planet simplifies resource management, tower defence, and first-person mechanics into a singular arcade experience. On the latest mission to Mars, the Orion III crash-landed. With Martian attacks looming, Houston most definitely has a problem!

name: My Girlfriend is a Futanari
description: One day, by complete happenstance you stumble upon your soulmate.

name: Space Cheetah Hyper Runner
description: Surf solar panels, bounce off trampoline nets, play low G space soccer, and beat your best times in the most exhilarating future sports event this side of Pluto! Full 3D, sandbox levels, and multiple game modes to master. This is it - the Hyper Games await!

name: Project: Extreme
description: Project: Extreme is a 3D realistic multiplayer online survival shooting game, an intense and exciting PVPVE competitive shooting experience, including in-depth survival exploration and collection, weapon modification, base development, character Growth, and other abundant content.

name: Snow Daze: Redaze
description: Critical Bliss and Outbreak Games join forces to deliver a retelling of the original hypno romp! You play as Jason, a fledgling musician who has strange desires for his family. Unable to keep his lust in check, Jason comes up with a plan to hypnotize all the voluptuous women in the house.

name: Fates: Determination
description: Fates Determination is a story driven episodic adult adventure that you play from two perspectives. Once from Jake's point of view and once from Amy's point of view. Be prepared to experience a plot full of drama, mysteries, superpowers and hot sex scenes!

name: Rangingstrike
description: Master the three weapons that change according to the humanoid robot form and fighter form, destroy the scattered enemy attack targets, and finally defeat the boss standing in your way!

name: Light Fairytale: Episode 3
description: A turn-based JRPG series featuring a modern presentation with a classic core. Episode 3 carries over with Haru as he gathers a party of new and old friends on a journey to the lost 'Sky'.

name: Defending Lydia Collier
description: Lydia Collier has been charged with the murder of her billionaire husband after he mysteriously vanished, and it is your job to prove her innocence. Find evidence, follow leads, make decisions and crack the case, and whilst you do it date and find love in London as a newly single, wealthy lawyer.

name: Paper Needs Inspiration!
description: The world is a big place and there is much to do. As Paper, an uninspired writer, you will discover the world and its many inhabitants! There is much to find and uncover.

name: Maintenance Safety: Pipes and Acids - VR Training
description: Train your professional skills in Maintenance Safety: Pipes and Acids - VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

name: Dolly Wars: Auto Tactics
description: Lead your Dolly army of squishy gummies to victory! Familiarize yourself with the strengths of each Dolly character and deploy them accordingly. Sit back and watch as your loyal Dollies move about and fight on their own. Win the war and turn the gummy world blue!

name: Psyke
description: Psyke is a psychedelic rhythm FPS roguelite about using psychic powers to make your escape! Explore the shifting laboratory and survive the physics based bullet hell onslaught.

name: Sex Hell
description: Sex Hell is a first-person shooter arena in the horror style. While playing on each level you have to fight with the boss to get a variety of adult scenes.

name: Aconite
description: Nowadays, it's very hard for people to earn really big money by fair means. And if someone wants to have at least some kind of fortune, then one has to make it somehow. So Mireille found a way to make her fortune.

name: My Mad Scientist Roommate Turned Me Into Her Personal Robotic Battle Maiden?!?
description: After being inadvertantly transformed into a robotic battle maiden by their criminially insane roommate, Sam is dragged along on a ridiculous adventure in a dimension full of ravenous monster girls. Will Sam find a way out of this mess and return to their original body? Probably not, but who knows!

name: Pipeline Panic
description: Good old fashioned 2D arcade fun with tons of upgrades and fast paced action where taking risks is rewarded with a higher score. Defend humanity's last source of energy wrench in one hand, laser gun in the other

name: GrassGames Hearts 3
description: The best Hearts Card Game around.

name: Hallowed Pumpkins
description: Hallowed Pumpkins is a simple survival light-horror with shooting and hiding mechanics. For the best experience this game is recommended to be played in multiplayer mode with your friends to fight with or against each other.

name: Paragonian 3: The Warrior of Light
description: Paragonian 3: The Warrior of Light is an ARPG that plays alone. Explore the Oriental World! Gwang, who lost his mind in the fight against Laijin, the god of lightning, is rescued by the chief of the village. He will lose Inner Qi in the fight against Laijin and must regain his strength.

name: Monster Hunters: Frost Giant
description: Follow the exciting adventures of this monster hunting family as they bring you on an epic journey. What started as a coming of age story quickly turned into a fight for survival when an ancient apocalyptic giant suddenly appeared.

name: Knights of Legends
description: Classic turn-based strategy game!

name: Cocktail Rush
description: Cocktail Rush is a match 3 game with visual novel elements and nice hand-drawn graphics. You need to help the cute bar workers with the work at the bar by connecting the same drinks into groups.

name: Barren Depths
description: Escape a confusing cave system without being eaten in this short, underwater horror game.

name: Cyber Bodies
description: Gather your willpower and investigate the truth about your past in a harsh and gloomy cyberpunk-style world. Take a closer look at others - who knows what goals they pursue and why they need you. Have fun, kill, fuck and uncover the main secrets of your bodies! Who knows what awaits you…

name: Sakura Hime 3
description: You have just graduated school and have landed your first job as a butler for the luxury apartments "Sakura Gardens." Your main goal is to become an excellent butler who gives the girls all the pleasure and happiness they need!

name: Urban Night Battle Girl
description: As night falls, Yinzhi encounters a major setback in her mission to protect the peace of the city. It was at this time that Yinzhi met you, but to her, would you be the angel of salvation or the messenger of hell?

name: Christmas Wonderland 5
description: Another Sensational Christmas Wonderland game for Everyone to Enjoy Christmas wouldn’t be Christmas without a new Christmas Wonderland! Christmas Wonderland 5 is crammed full of fabulous HOG scenes, lots of truly superb Mini Games and Puzzles for players of ALL ages and

name: A Hundred Kinds of Your Smile
description: A fun and causal girl's love RPG game, with some puzzles to solve. An adventure to save the lover through many parallel worlds.

name: Cherry Lady
description: Cherry Lady is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Escape From Zombies
description: Escape From Zombies is played alone or in cooperation, on a map where the player(s) must repel waves of zombies. It should be noted that the game does not end until all players are dead, the main goal is to beat the record of survived round.

name: Lost Between the Lines
description: Romantic Novel "OshiKano" Vol. 1! A large-volume romantic drama with beautiful illustrations by a popular artist!

name: Little Devil
description: Little Devil is a survival horror game for up to 5 players. You set out to look for your friend, but will you survive?

name: Your Blight
description: 'Your Blight' is a turn-based dark fantasy RPG that survives in a city sealed off by the appearance of a vampire. Survive for a limited time of 21 days. Explore the city. Meet the survivors. And uncover the secrets surrounding you and the world.

name: The Night of The Penanggalan
description: Retro styled low budget Asian Indie Walking Simulator Horror Game. Based on Malaysian and Indonesian supernatural beliefs, where the protagonist is a young pregnant mum to be who is being targeted and stalked by the feared night creature, The Penanggalan, or "The Flying Head".

name: Callthem
description: Police agent Jane, goes to a notice on route 45, where a motel is located, after that call, no one showed signs of life there, Jane will explore the motel in search of clues.

name: Vegetable Crash
description: Use your fork shooting ship to fight off hordes of eggplants, carrots and apple, in Vegetable Crash, a Galaxian/Galaga clone

name: Power Fail
description: You are in charge of keeping a mischievous old man from cutting the power lines that connect to the Hudson Soft development room. Power comes from a battery on the upper left of the screen and is represented by white characters with bolts on their heads called “Electric-Kun”. They will slowly make their way to the development room and once they reach it a programmer will churn out a program and Hudson will make some money and you’ll get points! However if they run into an area without a line they’ll disappear.

name: Hiyoko Fighter
description: In Hiyoko Fighter you control a little chick who must collect eggs dropped by chickens while being chased by snakes. It takes a couple of cues from Pac-Man as it has tunnels you can walk into to warp to another part of the screen when you’re feeling trapped. There are 3 eggs laid by the chickens, a white one that gives you points, a red one enables temporary invincibility and the ability to kill the green snakes, and a yellow egg will advance you to the next level.

name: The Spider
description:
It’s the year 2199 and your ship has been caught in a batch of strong magnetic storms and has somehow wound up near a black hole that is spewing robotic spiders and other insect-like creatures that are now attacking your ship.

Programmed by Toshiyuki Sasagawa, who would go onto write music for many popular Hudson Soft games.

name: Flatout
description: With more fun more action and more destruction than ever before Flatout brings you straight to the streets as you race for glory. With 12 locations 4 game modes and the ability to customize your car the action will never end! Choose one of 12 unique weapons in Trash Game Mode as you try to destroy your petition. Lock the pedal to the floor and keep your hands on the wheel - you're in for bumpy ride!

name: MJ-05
description: An action game where you pilot a mech known as MJ-05 and shoot at various enemies that upon being shot split into more ships to shoot down. There’s also a fuel gauge you have to keep an eye on as if it runs out you’ll lose a life. However it can be refilled by landing in a pod that scrolls along the bottom of the screen from time to time.

name: Chiki-chiki Machine Mou Race 2: In Space
description: When Milk (Penelope Pitstop) is kidnapped, players have to explore the cosmos to rescue her. This game is a mixture of a graphic adventure and a racing game. In the adventure segments, players travel to different planets where they talk with people and solve puzzles using a point-and-click interface. Periodically, players will need to race to progress; these scenes feature a behind-the-car perspective as players try to get first place in high-speed chases.

name: SlumberspaVIE: Visual Interactive Experience
description: A short desktop hidden-object game featuring music from the Slumberspa EP by Kaizo Slumber and original GBA-style visuals. Available as a download bonus.

name: Help!
description: For Help! you control a guy who swings a mean stick that will knock out snakes that come up from the ground and climb up the vines you can maneuver on. However the blue striped snakes cannot be killed and are quite fast and if they touch our hero he will lose a life and have to listen to some agonizing music and any yellow snakes will advance to the top of the tree. You can also get a game over if enough of the yellow snakes reach the top of the tree and eventually will reach the large apple above your girlfriends head. They’ll then cruelly drop it down on top of her head crushing her! Eventually if you club enough snakes you’ll move on to the next level but the amount of snakes that reached the top stay. The controls of the game are a bit difficult and make it tricky to maneuver the hero. If he’s holding on to two vines he cannot move up or down so you have to be careful.

name: Remember?
description: Escape from an entity and defend yourself using your surroundings. Try to remember.

name: The Sims
description: Home consoles version of The Sims.

name: Violet and the Lost Colors
description: Violet and the Lost Colors is a turn-based RPG Maker adventure game where you get to wander the depth of the forest as a witch to gather all the seven colors the princess has lost. It is developed from a simple thought of a strange fairy tale, where the protagonist has always been familiar with magic yet discovered something stranger than magic.

name: Dolchio
description: Dolchio is a story-focused RPG Maker game where you play as Dolchio the automaton. Help him make his wish come true in this wintery adventure!

name: Comet
description: To be able to see the comet again and save her best friend. The ailing girl embarks on a challenging journey.

name: Sunday Never Comes
description: A lo-fi psychological horror visual novel about futility.

name: Storytiming
description: In this deceptively difficult puzzle platformer, you guide our little hero through several challenging stages. Plan out your moves ahead of time, see them play out while the narrator cheers you on and enjoy the delightful art style of Storytiming the game.

name: Room Before the Dark
description: A short horror game where you must retrieve items around the house for a bunny;

name: Greaser
description: Greaser is a visual novel about riding a Cronenbergian biomechanical motorbike along an endless unreal desert highway

name: The Slaughter Spectrum
description: The Slaughter Spectrum is a five-map PK3 for Doom II and the GZDoom source port created by Bridgeburner56 in May 2019. It is a collection of slaughter maps that were influential for introducing a fresh visual style to the genre. At the 2019 Cacowards, this mapset was a runner-up, and Bridgeburner56 was named a promising newcomer.

name: Big's Big World
description: Oh no! Where did Froggy go this time? He's lost somewhere out in the big world. Play as Big the Cat and help reunite him with his pollywog pal in this open-world adventure.

name: Powder Game
description:
When whirlwind picks up the leaves, flow of the wind is visible and interesting.
Simulation game that reproduces such phenomenon with powder (dot)!

name: A Slasher Dating Sim
description: Have you ever watched a scary movie and said to your friend "hear me out"? Well, you've been heard! #slasherdatingsimulator demo out now!

name: 96: Another Story
description: This is a short spin-off that takes place 6-7 years before the events of the main game and dwells on what could have been.

name: The Long Trek Back Home
description: Meant to be an immediate follow-up to the story of Doom II, it features maps that are heavily inspired by their original counterparts, but with a reversed progression. The player begins at the destroyed Icon of Sin site and retraces their steps through the Hell levels, city levels and finally the starport levels, while facing increasingly heavy demonic opposition and changed, mostly destroyed and twisted architecture heavily reminiscent of the original layouts.

name: Joy
description: You play as Eli, a man thrown into a surreal and unexpected situation that will make him rethink about his whole life and both of his past and future actions. Will he be able to find happiness at the end of the tunnel?

name: The Cleaner
description:
Play as a mysterious trauma cleaner as he faces the end of society as we know it, brought to its knees by a new and unknown phenomenon that has no cure.

Having given up on most things, every day feels to him like the same sluggish chore of waking up, cleaning, going to sleep and repeating.

That is, until he receives a request like none other from a man he barely knows.

name: Ozonia
description: Ozonia is a 32 map megawad and third in the Moonblood trilogy. It's heavily inspired by Plutonia, but it has its own flavor to create a refreshing and unique classic Doom experience! Eviternity, Ancient Aliens, BTSX series and Monti's work are also other big influences.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man: Webslinger
description: The Amazing Spider-Man: Webslinger is a rhythm video game developed and published for mobile games. The idea behind Webslinger is to help Spider-Man swing on his webs to protect the streets.

name: Ultimate Spider-Man
description: Ultimate Spider-Man is a mobile adaptation of the 2005 console game of the same name. It's a side-scrolling platform game where the player can choose to play as either Spider-Man or Venom. As Spider-Man the objective is to save the citizens of New York from Venom's evil rampage before the population is reduced to less than five. Meanwhile, Venom's task is to attack and feed on the citizens before eliminating Spider-Man. Regardless of the character chosen the game contains the same twelve levels with the objectives being the same in all. The gameplay is also similar for both characters with running, jumping and swinging with either web or tentacles.

name: The Ninja
description: Adventure through the dark region of the Hado empire to find what is in the darkness that lies there and to go up against enemies that'll try to stop you.

name: Mini Putt
description: Mini Putt is a multiplayer minigolf game for you and your friends! Enjoy our carefully crafted maps and maps made by our awesome community using our advanced map editor!

name: Space Bot
description: Space Bot is a strategic action roguelite where your environment is fully desctructable, and out to get you. Destroy planets with your giant mining drill, and fight off dangerous alien lifeforms

name: Impossiball
description: A Strange and Silly Adventure with a challenge!

name: Funplace: After Hours
description: In this point and click horror game, you will outrun and defend yourself against monsters that follow you around a building of a dying company. Pay attention because each of these monsters are unique in their strategy to kill you.

name: The Letter: Classic Edition
description: The Letter: Classic Edition is the ORIGINAL experience from the classic title "The Letter", with a few changes and additions. Relive the Wii U game that gathered so much hate it became a cult classic. Embark on a creepy narrative driven tale about a boy in search of his missing father.

name: The Tower
description: The Tower is a casual-action style game with various levels and a final boss level. In this game, one must find or craft new weapons to defeat your foes, the chicken army. Along with enemy chickens, the Chicken Elder has also set up various traps and obstacles that block your way to him. Good luck!

name: DrugRunner
description: Drug Runner is a 3D game in which you have to run along the road and dodge obstacles, on the way collecting bonuses and coins that give you points. If you can jump over the barrier by pressing the "space bar".

name: Castle Defense Battles
description: Castle Defense requires strategic thinking and tactical timing to defend your Castle from an onslaught of evil monsters.

name: The Qin Empire
description: Set in the most dramatic era in Chinese history! Let's conquer the world like the first emperor by making full use of strategy and wisdom! This is the war that leads to the First Emperor!

name: External-Dimension: Mainframe
description: Blaze through the world of Mainframe in this fast paced Action-Platformer inspired by the Megaman Zero Series. You play as Frame, a Data Scanner who is tasked with combating the destruction of the world. Use a variety of movement options and weapons to overcome challenges to rid the world of +ERRoR.

name: Dr Livesey Rom and Death Edition
description: Gentlemen, from now on, rom and death means the same thing for you.

name: Bob's Journey
description: Wood brokes stone, stone smashes metal, and as always metal cut wood. An adventure through a map based on jokenpo principles, where if you use the right weapon on the right item/enemy, can you save resources and have bigger rewards.

name: Speed Up
description: Speed Up is a third-person runner-style arcade survival game.

name: Guardian of the Jungle
description: Guardian of the Jungle is a horizontal clear version of tower Beat'em Game. You need to obtain resources and allocate them reasonably, cultivate the team to grow, allocate ammunition reasonably, and solve monsters with absolute firepower. It is a pleasant game

name: Single Player: Horror
description: Single Player: Horror is a unique POV interactive experience. You don’t just play the role of Sophie, you see through her eyes. You wake up to find a Psycho Axe Killer in your living room who is desperate to chop you into pieces. Will you survive the night?

name: Bolo Legends: An Epic Adventure
description: Do you have what it takes to save a princess from Dark Lord who dares to threaten the whole world by consuming her powers and become threat to everyone's existence, then Bolo Legends is for you.

name: Book Travelers: A Victorian Story - Collector's Edition
description: As head librarian takes a strange turn when novelist Charlotte Brontë herself magically appears to ask for your help! Someone’s going into famous stories and changing them, threatening the worlds and characters inside. Can you travel into your favorite novels to stop a dangerous vigilante in time?

name: Survival in the Backrooms
description: Survival in the Backrooms is an atmospheric horror game in which you will wander for a long time through surreal corridors and rooms in search of a way out. Immerse yourself in this mysterious world and try not to become prey for its inhabitants.

name: Charged: RC Racing
description: Charged: RC Racing is all about speed and making use of random items. Drive RC Cars in different locations and use items to defeat your opponents.

name: Surviving the Aftermath: Shattered Hope
description: The Moon is shattered, what was once a beacon of hope in the sky has now left survivors to deal with a new, catastrophic void in “Shattered Hope”, the new Expansion for Surviving the Aftermath. Use the Moon’s fragments to your advantage and make sure to keep your hopes up (literally) to survive.

name: Tragedy of Medusa
description: Three primordial goddesses and sisters decide to leave their island to visit Athens in the middle of a war waged by other gods knows as the "Olympians". Survival ultimately becomes their goal as the Olympians seek to destroy them.

name: Meowjiro
description: Working as a convenience store clerk, you need to ring up purchases, clean the store, keep track of stock inventory, warm up bentos, make ice creams. Use your wage to furnish your home and raise Meowjiro.

name: Brain Memory
description: Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills. Let them become the masters of their own minds.

name: Car Parking Club
description: Visit a luxury club, where owners of the most exclusive, slickest and fastest cars come to unwind!

name: Paper Bad
description: Throw papers and smash stuff!

name: Montgomery Fox and the Case of the Missing Ballerinas
description: Ballerinas mysteriously vanish from the theatre but show must go on! Find her before it's too late.

name: A Role to Play
description:
In A Role to Play, an armored fellow of varying potential names must escort a princess through a besieged kingdom to safety, accompanied by several colorful, non-human companions.

Of course, that's only half the story.

Our real protagonist, Danny, has spent the past year recovering from a life-threatening incident that left him severely injured. Nearing his 21st birthday, and with some pressuring from his father, he leaves the solitude of his home to meet up with a local group of tabletop gamers at his town's library. A newcomer to tabletop, Danny finds that his new friends are about as unusual as the characters they play in-game.

name: Alltynex
description:
Alltynex was a game exclusively only for the Fujitsu FM Towns computer line. The game was never even featured on arcade cabinet.

"Alltynex is a vertically-scrolling shoot' em up. It's a doujin game developed by Satoshi Yoshida in 1996. He entered it in the 2nd ASCII Entertainment Software Contest (also known as A-con) held in 1996 and won the prize in the PC software category. As a result, the game was included on a CD that came with the magazine Login Softcon. In 1997 version 1.01 was released as freeware on the developer's website."

name: Arcade Archives: Itazura Tenshi
description:
Draw beautiful constellations in the night sky,
capture the heart of a celestial maiden in your hand!

name: Cat Tales
description: Open the door to the magical world of Cat Tales. Let your imagination run wild.

name: The Jumping Falafel
description:
Join BIG F on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: The Jumping Falafel: Turbo
description:
Join BIG F on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Shin Galaxy: Alpha War
description: A space shooter game with RPG mechanics. Players will be able to improve their ships to tackle the challenges ahead, as well as buy better ships and customize them.

name: Tyken
description: This is an indie game made by a solo developer set in the very distant future. You are a condemned prisoner forced to destroy the monsters at a clandestine genetic research facility located on planet Tyken. Use futuristic energy weapons in 10 unique environments.

name: Korean Political Fighters: 2ND
description: Korean Political Figures: 2ND is a fighting game featuring a Korean politician who inherited a mobile game of the same name. Choose the politician you support and be reborn as the strongest.

name: Asian Caprice
description: You are going to enjoy an evening in a company of a hot Asian girl. How do you want it to go? Will you just enjoy her dances and teasing or go for the full course? It's up to you!

name: Peck'Em

You can enjoy a passive tour that will show you the rise and life in the colony or you can explore it as a time traveler. Complete the task and save the time continuum! Welcome to Castrum Novum!

name: Spider-Man 3 Puzzle
description:
Spider-Man 3 Puzzle is a match-three puzzle game based on the 2007 film featuring the comic hero. As in other match-three games, the player is presented with a grid of tiles (here called tokens) that can be removed by making matches of three or more tiles of the same colour. What makes this variant of the concept different is that the objective isn't just to remove the tokens but to move Spider-Man across the grid to a special destination. Each level has a path that Spider-Man follows. The path is hidden and is only revealed by swapping and removing tokens that are over the path. Spider-Man moves automatically when the path is revealed. Each level is time-based and Spider-Man has to reach his destination before the timer runs out.

The game features some special power-up tokens that will help the player. For example, there are the scramble tokens that shuffle all tokens on the grid, the spider-sense tokens that reveal the path temporarily, and the rage tokens that can be used to plough through tokens blocking the path. Spider-Man will be chased by black goo on some levels and has to finish the levels before being caught.

name: Reiner Knizia's Kingdoms

Kingdoms is a clever tile-laying game by top eurogame designer, Reiner Knizia. In a medieval kingdom, you must scout out resources and hazards to decide where to build your mightiest castles. Commit too soon and you might discover a tribe of ogres right next door, but commit too late, and your opponents will grab up all the real estate!
Six different opponents, each with their own personality, challenge you at a variety of difficulty levels to make the game very replayable.
Kingdoms is built on the same successful MobileEuroCard platform that was used to create Reiner Knizia's High Society and Reiner Knizia's Money. Simple gestures allow you to grab and move tiles. Everything is animated, for a colorful play experience.
This newest version uses Game Center for leaderboards and achievements. We plan multiplayer play for a future release.

description: DJMAX RESPECT V - Clazziquzi Edition PACK! Now enjoy the songs of DJMAX Portable Clazziquzi Edition in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: DJMax Respect V: Trilogy Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V - TRILOGY PACK! Now enjoy the songs of DJMAX TRILOGY in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: DJMax Respect V: Technika 3 Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V - TECHNIKA 3 PACK! Now enjoy the songs of DJMAX TECHNIKA 3 in DJMAX RESPECT V.

description: DJMax Respect V: Chunithm Pack! Now enjoy the songs of Chunithm in DJMAX RESPECT V.

description: DJMAX RESPECT V - BLACK SQUARE PACK! Now enjoy the songs of DJMAX Portable BLACK SQUARE in DJMAX RESPECT V.

description: DJMax Respect V: Portable 3 Pack! Now enjoy the songs of DJMAX Portable 3 in DJMax Respect V.

name: DJMax Respect V: Technika Tune & Q Pack

description: DJMAX Collaboration with NEXON's popular games! Enjoy the tracks from NEXON in DJMAX RESPECT /V!

name: DJMax Respect V: V Extension II Pack

name: DJMax Respect V: Cytus Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V Cytus DLC!! Now enjoy the songs of Cytus in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: DJMax Respect V: V Extension Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V Original Tracks DLC!! Meet the 'V Original Music' package now!

name: DJMax Respect V: Technika Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V - TECHNIKA PACK! Now enjoy the songs of DJMAX TECHNIKA in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: DJMax Respect V: Groove Coaster Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V GROOVE COASTER DLC!! Now enjoy the songs of GROOVE COASTER in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: DJMax Respect V: Emotional Sense Pack
description: Meet the 'DJMAX Emotional Sense' package now! enjoy the songs in DJMAX RESPECT V!

name: Bus Simulator 18: Man Bus Pack 1
description: Attention all Seaside Valley bus drivers! Do you want to upgrade your fleet – preferably with brand-new buses? Have you been eagerly anticipating new MAN models? Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

name: Bus Simulator 18: Mercedes-Benz Bus Pack 1
description: This Bus Simulator 18 DLC includes three new buses licensed from Mercedes-Benz!

name: Bubbles Swimsuit
description: Play the classic bubble pop game, match 3 colors until clean the levels. In reward for solving the puzzles you can discover new girls in an adventure pixelated.

name: Bride Corruption
description: Do you need a wedding planner, by any chase? "Weddings & Co." will organise your wedding, take care of everything you need, and as a bonus - corrupt the bride!

name: Isekai Brick Breaker
description: Enjoy the sounds. Crush enemies and collect loot. Gain experience and improve skills. Open chests and equip gear. Complete quests and get rewards. Buy equipment in the shop with coins.

name: Big Farm Story: Shiver Night Pack
description: When witches go riding and pumpkins gleam, the moon laughs and whispers, ‘tis near Halloween! Enjoy our new Halloween DLC that brings you an exclusive pet as well as furniture, decoration pieces and building skins to spookify your farm.

name: Nothing to Declare
description: Nothing to Declare is a story-driven VR game with multiple endings where you play as a security agent in the Populistan International Airport. Your job is simple: check passports, frisk people, find contraband, make sure documents are in order and most important, follow the orders of your superior.

name: Big Farm Story: Pet Paradise Pack
description: Home is where your pet is happy! Enjoy new furniture and decoration pieces and transform your farm into a Pet Paradise.

name: Big Farm Story: Asian Package
description: This is additional content for Big Farm Story, but does not include the base game.

name: Big Farm Story: Peaceful Nature Pack
description: There is no better designer than nature! Enjoy our new nature DLC that brings you the most beautiful furniture and decoration pieces as well as skins for your farm buildings.

name: Rubber Bandits: Go Wild Pack
description: Release your inner beast!

name: Rugby Union Team Manager 4
description: The fourth instalment of “The Number 1 Rugby Union Management Game”. Rugby Union Team Manager 4 gives you full control of managing your own Rugby Union team. Training schedules, coaches, physios, scouting, finances, sponsors, facilities and more.

name: Run Run Boy
description: Run Run Boy game is a casual game based on the idea to run as fast as possible and so that no one can catch you.

name: Santa's Gifts
description: Ho, ho, ho! It feels better that the winter holidays are approaching. Have you been dutiful this year? Are you ready to help Santa? Clear his way so that he can make all children happy this year too, besides, what else is magic for? It's not so hard, just put your brain on and help Santa! Merry Christmas everyone!

name: Savage: Ultimate Boss Fight
description: Savage is a single-player action game that allows players to experience MMORPG-style battles. Many bosses are included this game. Unravel the gimmicks hidden in the attacks, find a strategy, and try to clear the stage.

name: Sanctum: Map Pack 2
description: This map pack adds three action packed levels to your game!ChasmThe Chasm was going to be a hub of transport and mining operations. The plan was to create thousands of new jobs and strengthen the living standards of the people of Elysion One. The Chasm was a good sign of a great future for humanity but nowadays it's abandoned.

name: SD Gundam G Generation Cross Rays: Added Dispatch Mission Set 3
description: The Added Dispatch Mission Set ③ DLC package contains four Dispatch Missions.

name: SD Gundam G Generation Cross Rays: Added Dispatch Mission Set 4
description: The Added Dispatch Mission Set ④ DLC package contains four Dispatch Missions.

name: SD Gundam G Generation Cross Rays: Expansion Pack
description: The new Expansion Pack includes higher difficulty challenges, a new stage and additional Units, Characters, Quests and Group Dispatch Missions.

name: Seductive Solitude
description: Seductive Solitude is a horror adventure game. Where you need to escape from the house by solving the mysterys, but do not be too insightful, because you are not alone and the house is changing.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Elite Fishing Equipment Pack
description: Fish like an Elite Angler with the new Elite Fishing Equipment Pack! Represent your roots as you hit the water with nation-based boat wraps & clothing. Conquer Mastery Challenges for items such as the unique Taku Time items and fine tune that fishing loadout with kit from Abu Garcia and Berkley.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Predator Equipment Pack
description: Become the ultimate predator and dominate the competition! The Predator Pack will set you up nicely to hunt and fight those lunkers into your boat so you can take your spot on the stage with the biggest bag of bass.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Synthwave Pack
description: Light up the lake with the radiating Synthwave Cosmetic Pack. With the Synthwave boat wrap, clothing, and glasses, you will glow neon bringing your bass fishing to an electrifying new level. Night-time’s not for sleeping anymore, find those midnight lunkers and let the neon spill across the water.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Throwback B.A.S.S. Pack
description: Flashback to old school bass fishing with the Throwback B.A.S.S. Pack. Celebrate the early days of Bassmaster and kit your angler & boat out with vintage Bassmaster colours, designs, and clothing that include original badge patches.

name: Worms Revolution: Customization Pack
description: Stand out from the crowd in Worms Revolution with the Customisation Pack.Customisation Pack Includes Exclusive new theme - The Junkyard. 5 new lethal physics objects - Car Battery, Pliers, Toxic Canister, Hot Air Gun & Anti-Freeze. 7 new hats - Bandana, Gear Stick, Tyre, Afro, Flat Cap, Rapper Hat & Backwards Baseball Hat.

name: Worms Rumble: Bank Heist Double Pack
description: Tool up with the Bank Heist Double Pack! Equipping you with outfits, emotes, banners and weapon skins to pull the ultimate bank job.

name: Worms Rumble: Captain & Shark Double Pack
description: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the arena… Land the Captain and Shark Double Pack today to receive new outfits, weapon skins, titles, banners and emotes to use on the battlefield in salty style!

name: Shadow Empire: Oceania
description: The new maps being generated with Oceania DLC change the feel and ambiance of the game completely. But it also changes the gameplay a lot and will make you experience a different style of game.

name: Worms Rumble: Honor & Death Pack
description: Rekindle your hunger for battle and glory with the Honor and Death Pack. As the forces of good and evil clash, where will you swear allegiance?

name: Worms: Ultimate Mayhem - Customization Pack
description: The Worms Ultimate Mayhem “Customization Pack” features hilarious new additions to extend the already vast array of customization options available in the game, including a number of crazy new hats, glasses, gloves, 5 new speech-banks and 5 new gravestones.

name: Sisters of Sweetwater
description: Experimental, nonlinear, horror, RPG

name: Sitri: Shadow Walk
description: As an agent of the Demon Lord's army who has infiltrated human society, you must seize the Holy Sword and carry out your mission.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Flower & Destiny Pack
description: Meet Flower & Destiny: the first DLC of Sixtar Gate: Startrail! This DLC contains 10 new songs and a new original theme.

name: Skater XL: Tampa Pro 2022 Gear Pack For Charity
description: Skatepark Of Tampa Pro 2022 Gear Collection pack includes 5 new gear items, featuring the official artwork of the world’s longest running skateboard contest. All proceeds will be donated to Boards For Bros, a non-profit organization that refurbishes used skateboards for underprivileged youth.

name: XCOM: Enemy Unknown - Slingshot Pack
description: In this new set of linked Council missions, you will meet an enigmatic Triad operative, and do battle with the aliens in the skies over China, and more.

name: XCOM 2: Resistance Warrior Pack
description: Customize your squad of resistance fighters with a set of bonus outfits and head gear, as well as custom armor and face camo. Instantly unlock a survivor of the old war as a new recruit in your barracks.

name: S.M.A.C.K.
description: S.M.A.C.K. is an online multiplayer, third-person sandbox shooter, where you suck ordinary objects into your personal particle-izer and fire them at your friends with specialized weapons placed within the environment. ANYTHING IS AMMO!

name: Slugmania
description: Worldeater Slug is threatening the world and the only way to beat it is to gather and train a team of diverse, friendly slugs! Slugmania is a cute, fast-paced, creature-collection roguelike deckbuilder.

name: XCOM 2: Reinforcement Pack
description: Bolster your ranks with three themed DLC packs available together for an amazing discounted value*. Each themed content pack will add unique new twists to the core game experience.

name: Slippery Richard!: He's Taller Than My Husband
description: An unplanned shotgun wedding! This isn’t the first time Yaya has made a mess of things and expected her mother to clean up... “When you truly love someone, you plan ahead—marriage is supposed to come before all that other stuff! Now I guess it’s up to me to test if he’s really husband material...”

name: Super Planet Life
description: Being a planet in space can be very lonely, but fortunately there is life out there. Search the corners of the universe for new friends, who will help you on your quest to become a happy little place to live. Manage your resources, upgrade tools, and fight through jerk-infested dungeons to advance.

name: Tales of Agaris: The Legendary Rion
description: An Action RPG game with a LINEAR REAL TIME battlle system made on RPG Maker MV.

name: Tales of Spark
description: "Tales of Spark" is a Hack & Slash Action RPG with an Eastern flair. Players assume the role of a young wandering swordsman, exploring the vast desert, seeking treasures, defeating powerful bosses, and even slaying gigantic celestial dragons.

name: The Adventures of Snacky
description: The Adventures of Snacky is a cute and fun platform jumper. You as snacky the vending machine must run jump and shoot your way through this new and hostile world, avoiding obstacles Emery's finding checkpoints and coins.

name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department - Injuries Package #1
description: Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack.

name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department - Injuries Package #2
description: Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack.

name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department - Infections Package
description: Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack.

name: Payday 2: Biker Character Pack
description: Loyalty can always be bought...The Biker Character Pack is the 10th character pack for PAYDAY 2. We are especially proud to introduce Ron Perlman as our new PAYDAY member Rust! The Biker Character Pack comes with the Breaker 12G Shotgun, the Chain Whip melee weapon, the Biker Perk Deck and Rust’s Mask.

name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department - Older Adult Cases Package
description: Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack.

name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department - Pediatric Common Disease Package
description: Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack.

name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department - Pediatric Digestive Disease Package
description: Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack.

name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department - Pediatric Infant Cases Package
description: Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack.

name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department - Pediatric Rare Disease Package
description: Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack.

name: Payday 2: Clover Character Pack
description: The Luck of the Irish.The Clover Character Pack is the 14th DLC for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to play as Clover, the Irish Burglar of the PAYDAY gang. Other than Clover herself, it includes the Burglar perk deck, Clover's mask, Clover's Shillelagh melee weapon and the Queen's Wrath assault rifle.

name: Payday 2: Dragan Character Pack
description: Cruel, brutal and utterly ruthless.The Dragan Character Pack is the 16th DLC for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to play as Dragan, the Croatian Infiltrator of the PAYDAY gang. Other than Dragan himself, it includes the Infiltrator perk deck, Dragan's mask, Dragan's Cleaver knife melee weapon and the Lion's Roar assault rifle.

name: Vital Signs: Emergency Department - Pediatric Respiratory Disease Package
description: Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack.

name: Payday 2: Dragon Pack
description: The Payday Gang is back with a new heist and new cosmetics, stealing a priceless gold dragon statue in Chinatown, San Francisco.

name: Payday 2: Federales Weapon Pack
description: The Federales Weapon Pack DLC includes three new pistols, all of which are capable of full auto fire. Each of these weapons also has an akimbo option. 10 new weapon mods are also included.

name: Payday 2: Gage Assault Pack
description: When plan A is not an option.The Gage Assault Pack DLC is the tenth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds an arsenal of assault weapons to the PAYDAY gang to control the chaos of the battlefield.Three new assault rifles, four new melee weapons, the return of the GL40 grenade launcher, a host of mods, four new masks, patterns and materials are...

name: Payday 2: Gage Chivalry Pack
description: Time to explore the art of ancient warfare and get medieval on some asses.The Gage Chivalry Pack is the 28th DLC for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration between Torn Banner Studios and OVERKILL! Go medieval on D.C.

name: Payday 2: Gage Historical Pack
description: Meet the real classics.The Gage Historical Pack DLC is the 12th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds a variety of historical weapons so you can heist as if it was World War II.Four new ranged weapons, four new melee weapons, twice the weapon slots, a host of mods, four new masks, patterns and materials are also included.

name: Payday 2: Gage Ninja Pack
description: Friends, it's time you learn a little something - from the Ninja.The Gage Ninja Pack DLC is the 26th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds an array of Ninja weapons that Gage brought with him from his travels to the east.

name: Payday 2: Gage Shotgun Pack
description: Finally shotguns get some love!The Gage Shotgun Pack DLC is the ninth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds Gage's favorite shotguns to the player's weapon arsenal. Depending on what kind of ammo type you use, the shotgun pellets you fire can have armor penetration or be explosive, stunning your opponents.

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Shadaloo Vacation Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new vacation themed outfits for M.Bison, Sagat, Vega, Balrog, and Seth.

name: Payday 2: H3H3 Character Pack
description: Ethan and Hila Klein never really thought they could benefit the PAYDAY gang. But Bain thought otherwise. As Ethan and Hila’s fame reached the sky, Bain saw an opportunity for some more “showmanship” and maybe improving public relations.

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Shadaloo Wild Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new wild outfits for M.Bison, Sagat, Vega, Balrog, and Seth.

description: All alternate costumes for Zangief, E.Honda, Rufus, Abel and El Fuerte are included in this pack. Make these characters even more unique with these wild costumes!

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Complete Challengers 2 Pack 2011
description: All alternate costumes for Juri, Ibuki, Cody, Adon and T.Hawk are included in this pack. Create a new legend with these crazy costumes!

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Complete Classic Pack 2011
description: All alternate costumes for Guile, Blanka, Dhalsim, Gen and Fei Long are included in this pack. Show everyone that legends never die, and never go out of fashion!

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Complete Shadoloo Pack 2011
description: All alternate costumes for Balrog, Sagat, Vega, M. Bison and Seth are included in this pack. Don these threads and take down all of your rivals in style!

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Complete Shoryuken Pack 2011
description: All alternate costumes for Ryu, Ken, Gouken, Dan and Akuma are included in this pack. Mix things up with your favorite Shotokan characters!

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Complete Challengers 1 Pack 2011
description: All alternate costumes for Hakan, Makoto, Guy, Dudley and Dee Jay are included in this pack. Don your ultra rad gear and go to town on the opposition!

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Femme Fatale Horror Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new horror outfits for Chun-Li, C.Viper, Sakura, Rose, and Cammy.

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Femme Fatale Vacation Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new vacation themed outfits for Chun-Li, C.Viper, Sakura, Rose, and Cammy.

description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new wild outfits for Chun-Li, C.Viper, Sakura, Rose, and Cammy.

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Shadaloo Horror Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new horror outfits for M.Bison, Sagat, Vega, Balrog, and Seth.

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Complete Femme Fatale Pack 2011
description: All alternate costumes for Chun-Li, C.Viper, Sakura, Rose and Cammy are included in this pack. Make these gorgeous and dangerous femme fatales ultra stunning with these outfits!

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: 2014 Challengers Horror Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new horror outfits for Rolento, Elena, Poison, Hugo, and Decapre.

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: 2014 Challengers Vacation Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new vacation themed outfits for Rolento, Elena, Poison, Hugo, and Decapre.

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: 2014 Challengers Wild Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new wild outfits for Rolento, Elena, Poison, Hugo, and Decapre.

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Arcade Challengers Pack 2011
description: All alternate costumes for Yun, Yang, Evil Ryu, and Oni are included in this pack. Make the newest challengers stand out from the pack with these slick outfits!

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Arcade Challengers Vacation Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new vacation themed outfits for Yun, Yang, Evil Ryu, and Oni.

name: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Arcade Challengers Wild Pack
description: Alternate costume pack for USFIV. Contains new wild outfits for Yun, Yang, Evil Ryu, and Oni.
